ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill Increases
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah thanks for the reminder, I forgot there was so many of those bastards out there, and at 39 as a necro I can solo them and have 60 mana left after the
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Nov 2000 jcs0001@... wrote:

|yeah, but at what levels does this start happening? i mean cmon.
|
|Im a 34 enchanter, and i cant even come CLOSE that 10-15kpp or even have a
|dream of it.
|
|The only things i know that drop decent play are Hill Gisnts in Rathe, and
|they are too high a level for me to Solo effectively.
|
|does it start at 40? what about 50?
|
|cause i know that 50 is at least 2-3 months away for me, which is sad =(

Ah thanks for the reminder, I forgot there was so many of those bastards
out there, and at 39 as a necro I can solo them and have 60 mana left
after the fight (but sometimes the shit hits the fan and it's much
harder; doh!).

I'll try those. Wish I could get those damn JBoots, that's one annoying
camp.

BTW I was surprised I saw a guy /auctionning to buy rebreathers, lots of
them (guess he was going to go in KK with his whole guild).

PS: can you make rebreathers with used aqualungs?
